import React, { useRef } from 'react' export default function Task(props) { function openModal() { ref.current.click() } async function editTask(id) { await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/tasks/${id}`, { method: "PUT", mode: "cors", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjo1fSwiaWF0IjoxNzA0NzY1ODcwfQ.gee66hhxU7DmQMOReq9B67VqMzdP9j22rmvjoRwsKzE" }, body: JSON.stringify(data) }) } async function deleteTask(id) { await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE", mode: "cors", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyIjp7ImlkIjo1fSwiaWF0IjoxNzA0NzY1ODcwfQ.gee66hhxU7DmQMOReq9B67VqMzdP9j22rmvjoRwsKzE" } }) } const ref = useRef(null) return ( <>

1 {props.taskDescription} {props.dueDate} ) }
